IntegerParameter.Name: stretch_factor
IntegerParameter.Description: The percentage for frame stretch. Class 1 parameter. Default=66

IntegerParameter.Name: acf_decimation_frequency
IntegerParameter.Description: Value used to calculate the auto-correlation-step for frequency decimation. Class 2 parameter. Default=4000

IntegerParameter.Name: vad_negative_offset
IntegerParameter.Description: DC remover high-pass filter coefficient (in number of right shifts). Class 2 parameter. Default=7

IntegerParameter.Name: tail_portion2
IntegerParameter.Description: Tail of the pointer for SLV buffer - 2nd portion. Class 2 parameter. Default: NB = 322 and WB = 642

IntegerParameter.Name: head_portion2
IntegerParameter.Description: Head of the pointer for SLV buffer - 2nd portion. Class 2 parameter. Default: NB = 323 and WB = 643

IntegerParameter.Name: tail_portion3
IntegerParameter.Description: Tail of the pointer for SLV buffer - 3rd portion. Class 2 parameter. Default: NB = 704 and WB = 1404

IntegerParameter.Name: head_portion3
IntegerParameter.Description: Head of the pointer for SLV buffer - 3rd portion. Class 2 parameter. Default: NB = 705 and WB = 1405

IntegerParameter.Name: buff_size_portion1
IntegerParameter.Description: Size of the SLV buffer - 1st portion. Class 2 parameter. Default: NB = 322 and WB = 642

IntegerParameter.Name: buff_size_portion2
IntegerParameter.Description: Size of the SLV buffer - 2nd portion. Class 2 parameter. Default: NB = 382 and WB = 762

IntegerParameter.Name: buffer_empty
IntegerParameter.Description: Number of frames when we consider the buffer 3rd portion is empty. Class 2 parameter. Default=2

IntegerParameter.Name: buffer_full
IntegerParameter.Description: Number of frames when we consider the buffer 3rd portion is full. Class 2 parameter. Default=2

IntegerParameter.Name: vad_noise_level_smooth_coef
IntegerParameter.Description: Smoothing coef for noise level. Class 2 parameter. Default=1024

IntegerParameter.Name: buff_size_total
IntegerParameter.Description: Size of the total buffer for SLV module in milliseconds. Class 2 parameter. Default=4000
